Jane Legard1

F, #552242

Last Edited=29 Jul 2012

Jane Legard is the daughter of Richard Legard.1 She married John Hotham, son of Sir Francis Hotham and Mary Hercy, on 10 January 1585.1

From 10 January 1585, her married name became Hotham.1

Martha Iris Molly Graham1

F, #552244, b. 7 August 2017

Last Edited=9 Sep 2017

Martha Iris Molly Graham was born on 7 August 2017.1 She is the daughter of Edward Richard Graham and Olivia Hope Warburton.1

Lucie Olivia Anne Guest1

F, #552245, b. 1998

Last Edited=29 Jul 2012

Lucie Olivia Anne Guest was born in 1998.1 She is the daughter of Hon. David William Graham Guest and Dr. Jane L. Polglase.1

Hon. Simon Edward Grhaam Guest1

M, #552246, b. 22 April 1949

Last Edited=29 Jul 2012

Hon. Simon Edward Grhaam Guest was born on 22 April 1949.1 He is the son of Christopher William Graham Guest, Baron Guest and Catherine Geraldine Hotham.1 He married Fiona Lamont, daughter of Robert Wilson Taylor Lamont of Kilmarnock, in 1977.1

He was educated at Charterhouse School, Godalming, Surrey, England .1 He graduated from Dundee University, Dundee, Angus, Scotland , with a Bachelor of Laws (LL.B.)1 He was a practising Writer to the Signet (W.S.)1

Children of Hon. Simon Edward Grhaam Guest and Fiona Lamont

Joanna Katie Guest1 b. 1978

Michael Simon Lamont Guest1 b. 1980

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 1974. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

Major Richard Hotham1

M, #552247, b. 16 October 1832, d. 23 February 1917

Last Edited=29 Jul 2012

Major Richard Hotham was born on 16 October 1832.1 He was the son of Captain George Hotham and Caroline Watt.1 He married Ellen (?)1 He died on 23 February 1917 at age 84.1

He gained the rank of Adjutant and Honorary Major in the 11th Middlesex Royal Volunteer Corps.1
